DESCRIPTION: Create a deck with your cards to fight a boss!
IN_RAID: This command cannot be used while in raid
UNIQUE_WARN: All abilities in a deck have to be unique in order to use them for duels or raids!
MISSING_SILVERS: You do not have enough `Silver` to unlock the slot
UNLOCK_WARN: Unlock slot number {{deckNo}} in order to generate a random deck
MISSING_CODES: > At least 3 card codes are required
MOVES_UNIQUE: All abilities in the deck must be unique! Select a different card or ability for the same card
SAVE_DECK: Click on save to set this deck
EMBED_FOOTER: Note : All abilities in a deck have to be unique in order to use them for duels or raids!
UNLOCK_SAVE: Unlock slot number {{deckNo}} in order to save a deck there
UNLOCK_GENERATE: Unlock slot number {{deckNo}} to generate a random deck
NOT_ENOUGH_CARD: You do not have enough cards with different moves. Please collect more cards
UNLOCK_SELECT: Unlock slot number {{deckNo}} in order to select a deck from there
